metadata.title: CVE-2022-25255 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Qt 5.9.x through 5.15.x before 5.15.9 and 6.x before 6.2.4 on Linux andUNIX, QProcess could execute a binary from the current working directorywhen not found in the PATH.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt5concurrent5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5core5a - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5dbus5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5gui5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5network5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5opengl5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5printsupport5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5-ibase - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5-mysql - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5-odbc - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5-psql - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5-sqlite - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5sql5-tds - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5test5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5widgets5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
libqt5xml5 - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
qt5-flatpak-platformtheme - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
qt5-gtk-platformtheme - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
qt5-qmake - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
qt5-qmake-bin - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
qt5-xdgdesktopportal-platformtheme - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
qtbase5-examples - 5.15.8+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.8+dfsg-2').
